title: Indiana Health Information Exchange Named One of Modern Healthcare's Best Places to Work in Healthcare 2015
text:
Indiana Health Information Exchange Named One of Modern Healthcare's Best Places to Work in Healthcare 2015 [September 08, 2015] Tweet 
Modern Healthcare has named the Indiana Health Information Exchange (IHIE) among the 100 companies and organizations on its "Best Places to Work in Healthcare for 2015." IHIE is one of only three Indiana-based organizations, and the only health information exchange organization in the country, to make the list. 
As the nation's largest health information exchange, IHIE seamlessly provides clinical data where and when it is needed to improve patient care and support better health outcomes. IHIE's robust and secure system is one of the best examples to demonstrate the national goal of healthcare "interoperability" by connecting separate technology solutions, providers, payors and others seamlessly to exchange and interpret data. 
"Our work allows us to conceive and develop creative, unique solutions to support the needs of our customers today and respond to changes in healthcare," said John Kansky, President and CEO of IHIE. "But more than anything, it is satisfying to know that our work can make a real difference in the lives of patients." 
For additional information about Modern Healthcare's Best Places to Work list, visit the complete list of honorees . The ranked order will be revealed in October. 
About the Indiana Health Information Exchange (IHIE) 
IHIE operates the nation's largest health information exchange, providing a secure, robust and interoperable health information technology network that connects over 100 hospitals, long-term care facilities, rehabilitation centers, community health clinics and other healthcare providers. IHIE provides the nation's largest implementation of clinical results delivery (DOCS4DOCSÂ® Service). The organization supports the Indiana Network for Patient Care, a clinical data repository accessed via IHIE's CareWeb application.
